column5: Heard it this morning. Any truth to rumour ? If so, Minaki Lodge is getting a good guy in Rob.WrD

I can now cinfirm that I am on the Minaki Lodge guiding team. I'll also have expanded duties in the "pro shop" area.......I'll keep y'all posted and if your out there, PLEASE drop by the tackle shop and say hello ! No need to buy anything, just come introduce yourself ! Rob
We'll stop by and say hi. Does that mean I wont have to pay $20 for a shadrap from Duane??:-)<{{}}><
Congrats Congrats Congrats!!!!Hoist a Bud Ice or whatever your fav is these days for me buddy.ToddYup, got her... feel that head shake!
Rob,How did you go from "no truth" to "confirmed" in two days? Congrats on your new gig. See ya this June.Brian

Coming up June 16th - 20th. How is the fishing that time. I usually come up early June. Looking forward to getting back to Minaki. How good will your leeches be. It has been my favorite bait up there for years but usually can't get any good sized ones. See you in June,good luck.
